Belthassan: Melchana, sitrep?

Melchana answered in nothing more than a whisper and in very short
sentences so as not to be discovered.

Melchana: Made noise. Trying diplomacy.

Gesper: Are you nuts?!? Since when have you been a diplomat?!?!

Had he been there, she would have knocked him unconscious. He was
lucky this time.

Belthassan: All right, but keep it very, very soft.

Melchana: Roger. Kick monkey for me.

She jumped down to the metallic floor and landed with a little noise.

Melchana: Hey, you can show up. I know you're there. I'm not here to
hurt you unless you ask for it.

There was a reason Gesper and Belthassan had been reluctant to let her
play the diplomat. She was a hunter before anything and she knew it.
She was better with her claws than with her tongue.


> Stopping dead in her tracks, she heard something. Being a Decepticon
Recon 
> agent didn't mean for her to take any little thing lightly. 
> 
> She listened, her hearing different than what she was used to. She
was able 
> to .. smell, as well. Odd,.. another thing she was not used to. 
> 
> Cautiously, she stepped forward very slowly with each step. She
could tell 
> something was nearby. Her clear blue eyes glanced about. Taking one
step at a 
> time, slowly. She would be on alert, ready to defend or attack if
she were 
> jumped. She cursed being in this form. In her warrior form, she was
dangerous 
> enough & could lay waste nearly anything that was within her path.
